Node.Text: Steve, man, if I were you, I would start looking for a new place of employment.
Hang on, what are you talking about?
Just get me to the lobby. I'm getting out of here. First it was just a suicide, then an accident, and now murder? This place isn't safe anymore.
We don't know for sure if it was murder, but you're right, things aren't looking good. Have you heard anything?
If I knew something, I would be dead, too! Actually - WAIT, I heard Virginia and Caroline arguing earlier. I don't know what about, but it sounded serious.
I'm getting out of here. Good luck, Steve, if you decide to stick around.
